short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns you from a slacktivist to an activist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS EXTENSION IS IN BETA.

This extension aims to question users' slacktivist behavior on Facebook by replacing word "Like" with "Donate". In further updates, I will attempt in providing users with links to donate.
